Package bacnet.datamodel.sequenceNCBI

Class GenomeNCBI

java.lang.Object
bacnet.datamodel.sequenceNCBI.GenomeNCBI
public class GenomeNCBI extends Object
Object containing an entire genome, created from NCBI RefSeq data
Data for this genome come from: NCBI.fna (for the sequence) NCBI.gff (for Gene, CDS, and ncRNA lists) If it exists some information are added: Rfam.gff (other info) supp info in a .txt file supp info about RAST results in a .txt file For EGD-e only: Srna.xml are read to add to the genome
Author:
UIBC

    Constructor

    GenomeNCBI()
     
    GenomeNCBI(String genomePath, boolean annotation)
    Create a genome with all chromosomes found If annotation = TRUE , we had the annotation we can found in other fasta files annotation = FALSE, we read only the complete genome + eventual plasmids

    • PATH_GENOMES_NEW

      @Deprecated public static String PATH_GENOMES_NEW
      Deprecated.
      only used in Old Listeriomics database
      Path for all new Genomes : Database.getInstance().getPath() + "/GenomeNCBI/GenomesNew/"; This might be used if all IDs have been changed on NCBI servers like it was the cas in Sept 2016

      public static String processGenomeName(String genomeName)

      All "_" already present are replaced by "--"

      Returns:
